participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and introspective, always seeking knowledge and new experiences.
participant_1.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. i'm an avid kayaker. i walk dogs for a living.

participant_2.name: Chris
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and practical, with a strong sense of responsibility towards family and community.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. i've a son who is in junior high school. my father used to work for home depot. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
